result.eng: They took off everything I was wearing.
result.ga: bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.orig: bhain siad díom a raibh umam
result.html: bhain siad díom a raibh umamThey took off everything I was wearing.
result.ponchtml: ḃain siad díom a raiḃ umamThey took off everything I was wearing.

result.eng: He took the picture off the wall.
result.ga: bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.orig: bhain sé an pictiúr den bhalla
result.html: bhain sé an pictiúr den bhallaHe took the picture off the wall.
result.ponchtml: ḃain sé an pictiúr den ḃallaHe took the picture off the wall.

result.eng: He always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ga: bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.orig: bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúl
result.html: bhíodh sé i gcónaí ar thús cadhnaíochta nuair a bhíodh cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.
result.ponchtml: ḃíoḋ sé i gcónaí ar ṫús caḋnaíoċta nuair a ḃíoḋ cruinniú ar siúlHe always took the lead when there was a meeting.

result.eng: He left Connemara and took to London.
result.ga: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féin
result.orig: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féin
result.html: d'fhág sé conamara agus thug londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.
result.ponchtml: d'ḟág sé conamara agus ṫug londain air féinHe left Connemara and took to London.

result.ga: thug siad an sliabh orthu féin
result.orig: thug siad an sliabh orthu féin
result.html: thug siad an sliabh orthu féinThey took to the mountains.
result.ponchtml: ṫug siad an sliaḃ orṫu féinThey took to the mountains.

result.eng: He took the car and went.
result.ga: thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.orig: thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leis
result.html: thóg sé an carr agus d'imigh leisHe took the car and went.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg sé an carr agus d'imiġ leisHe took the car and went.

result.eng: It took me half a year to write the book.
result.ga: thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.orig: thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobh
result.html: thóg sé leathbhliain orm an leabhar a scríobhIt took me half a year to write the book.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg sé leaṫḃliain orm an leaḃar a scríoḃIt took me half a year to write the book.

result.eng: He took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ga: thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.orig: thóg sé scian amach as a phóca
result.html: thóg sé scian amach as a phócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg sé scian amaċ as a ṗócaHe took a knife out of his pocket.

result.eng: She stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ga: bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.orig: bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhain
result.html: bhain sí searradh as a géaga agus tharraing anáil dhomhainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.
result.ponchtml: ḃain sí searraḋ as a géaga agus ṫarraing anáil ḋoṁainShe stretched her limbs and took a deep breath.

result.eng: The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
result.ga: ghlac na lochlannaigh seilbh ar eabhrac sa bhliain 867
result.orig: ghlac na lochlannaigh seilbh ar eabhrac sa bhliain 867
result.html: ghlac na lochlannaigh seilbh ar eabhrac sa bhliain 867The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.
result.ponchtml: ġlac na loċlannaiġ seilḃ ar eaḃrac sa ḃliain 867The Vikings took York in their possession in the year 867.

result.eng: She grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.
result.ga: rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín as
result.orig: rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín as
result.html: rug sí ar an ghloine agus bhain súimín asShe grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.
result.ponchtml: rug sí ar an ġloine agus ḃain súimín asShe grabbed the glass and took a sip from it.

result.eng: They took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ga: thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.orig: thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an lá
result.html: thóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roimh an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
result.ponchtml: ṫóg siad ó mo leaba mé uair roiṁ an láThey took me out of my bed an hour before daybreak.
